author: bvahdat
msg: Get rid of the maven <jclouds-feature-version> property so that we manage the jclouds version consistently & only through the <jclouds-version> property.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Varun Bhansaly "Email configuration - mail.smtp.starttls.enable ignored" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4943
The email configuration setting mail.smtp.starttls.enable is ignored by the system.
I encountered this while configuring OFBiz an email server which had TLS enabled.

author: jleroux
msg: At r1395115 I used the wrong patch, I should have used the one for 10.04, here is the fix

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1395109, revert the deprecation of svn_ra_get_file() and
svn_ra_get_dir2() as the new functions weren't introduced by this merge.
(The prototypes were introduced, but the implementations weren't)
This should fix the swig wrappers and the shared library build on Windows.
